overview:
Boca Technology Group (BTG) has been helping businesses and entrepreneurs grow their online presence for years. BTG has helped over 100 company’s reach their business goals through creating high-end professional websites, developing custom software and providing internet marketing services.

Since the companyâ€™s inception in 2006, Boca Technology Group has worked with over 25 different industries worldwide, from start-up entrepreneurs and successful small businesses to large and publicly traded companies including Live Nation Worldwide, Inc.(NYSE: LYV), Trimble (NASDAQ: TRMB) and Florida Atlantic University. With offices conveniently located throughout South Florida, BTG is able to provide the highest level of customer service and in-house professional services to each and every one of its clients.
